name: Pinball Infinite
description:
How far can you fall without being hit?

Avoid enemies and obstacles to get the furthest distance, and shoot for the highest speed! Spikes and Bats will kill you, and the bouncers will send you flying!

This game is extremely simple. I wanted to experiment with generating levels, as well as messing with some time manipulation in unity, so this was a great jam to try out some features of unity I wasn't yet used to.
